title: I know EoN is busted right now but
body:
complaining and filling the boards with complaints doesn't do anything riot already said the item was getting a nerf as soon as they can so wait it out

Quote: "We're going to see if we can pull a nerf for Edge of Night forwards into 7.4, or at least do a low risk hotfix the same day 7.4 hits. Urgency on that feels high enough at this point we don't think we should wait another patch. Most likely changes (still being discussed) are increasing the CD again and lowering the AD on it. Possible whatever changes are made will be temporary as well if the conclusion during 7.5 development is a different nerf is better long term."

replies.body:
Most people that complain on the forums don't look at patch notes or realize anything bout the game until they experience it.

Hence most people the complain about teemo, only complain because they lost to one. lol

That comment of riot makes me want to make another comment about actually nerfing the item and not just a minor hotfix to it. The urgency doesn't look great, it is great ffs. A patch more of EON and the game will suffer a huge toxic over shock. If anything, i think people need to moan more so riot actually nerfs this sht since to me, from the looks of it they are not planning on doing anything to its active which is actually the worst part of it. Replacing CD with AD is balancing if lets say 20 AD was reduced fro 10% CD. That will hardly make any difference to the item whilst CD is not bad in itself.
